The Elder Sabbadaya’s Birth Story
“Having gone to the great ocean,
my dwelling is well-constructed;
The well-constructed lotus pond,
is filled with the calls of cakravākas.
It is covered with mandārava flowers,
and with lotuses and water lilies;
And a river flows there,
with a beautiful and delightful ford.
It is filled with fish and turtles,

Endowed with the seven treasures,

The trees are all made of gold,

They shine day and night,

Sixty thousand musical instruments,

Sixteen thousand women,
